name: Zpop Media
tag_list: online-video-advertising, video-ads, video-marketing, online-video, website-video, online-marketing
overview:
It is the goal of Zpop Media to help businesses integrate video into their online presence, and use video as an online marketing tool to extend and drive awareness of their brands. We believe strongly in online video marketing, online video advertising, and website video.

We are a team of online media and video production professionals based in Bellevue, Washington. Founder and Executive Producer, Scott Weiss, began creating his own web based reality programs, which led to zpop.tv, our innovative online video network. Via our network of independent videographers all around the country, weâ€™re able to help local business owners take advantage of the benefits of online video marketing, and continue to partner with name brand organizations to deliver world class online video solutions.
